intents.sub_intent: understanding key elements of insurance policies
intents.user_motivation: Users want to make informed decisions about insurance coverage and benefits.
intents.search_context: Users search this when comparing policies or preparing to purchase insurance.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Leverage ING's trusted reputation to provide clear, actionable advice on policy selection.
intents.content_format_recommendation: Detailed guides with visuals and examples.

intents.sub_intent: avoiding common mistakes when dealing with insurance adjusters
intents.user_motivation: Users want to protect their claims and avoid jeopardizing their settlements.
intents.search_context: Users search this after filing a claim or during disputes with adjusters.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Provide expert advice and tips to build trust and credibility.

intents.user_motivation: Users want to ensure they receive the full value of their insurance claims.
intents.search_context: Users search this during or after filing claims for damages or losses.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Highlight ING's customer-centric approach and expertise in claim management.

intents.user_motivation: Users want to save money on auto insurance while maintaining adequate coverage.
intents.search_context: Users search this when renewing policies or comparing providers.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Promote ING's competitive pricing and bundling options.

sub_intents: understanding key elements of insurance policies
avoiding common mistakes when dealing with insurance adjusters
intent_clusters.ing_competitive_advantage: ING's digital tools and customer trust can simplify complex insurance topics.
intent_clusters.content_strategy: Create a unified hub of insurance resources with tailored advice for different user needs.

highest_probability_streams: understanding key elements of insurance policies
